name: @vue-office/excel
description: 通过Vue开发的办公文档预览组件，支持docx、pdf、ppt、excel的预览
author: hit757

scripts.copyFile: cp src/index.css lib/index.css && cp lib/excel.umd.min.js lib/index.js && cp ../../README.md README.md
scripts.build: vue-cli-service build --target lib  --dest lib index.js && npm run copyFile
